description: Services supporting entities in risk analysis risk assessment and development of cybersecurity risk-management policies
Services supporting incident detection reporting response and recovery operations
Services supporting business continuity planning backup management disaster recovery
Services for supplier assessment contract management vulnerability tracking in supply chain
Services for secure software development lifecycle vulnerability handling secure acquisition of ICT products/services
Services for assessing effectiveness of cybersecurity measures and NIS2 compliance status
Services for cybersecurity awareness training on phishing/social engineering zero-trust implementation
Services for cryptographic key management end-to-end encryption encrypted communications
Services for human resources security access control policies multi-factor authentication privilege management
Services for inventory management classification lifecycle management of ICT assets
Services for vulnerability disclosure coordination patch management EUVD submission
Services for incident reporting to CSIRT multi-stage notification (24h/72h/1m) cross-border coordination
Services for continuous monitoring intrusion detection security event analysis SIEM
Services for penetration testing security assessments vulnerability scanning red team exercises
Services for incident investigation evidence collection root cause analysis forensic analysis
Services for large-scale incident/crisis coordination incident escalation procedures
Services for inter-CSIRT cooperation multi-jurisdictional incident response
